sentences.sContent: All visitors to the apartment building must be announced.
sentences.sCn: 那幢公寓楼的访客都必须通报。

sentences.sContent: After announcing himself at the reception desk, James was led upstairs.
sentences.sCn: 在接待处通报姓名后，詹姆斯被领上楼去。

remMethod.val: an + nounce(讲话， 说出) → 说出来 → 宣布

trans.tranCn: 宣布， 发表； 通报…的到来
trans.tranOther: to officially tell people that someone has arrived at a particular place
